description:
Lighter, faster, and stronger, Continental has made one of their best road tires even better. The GP 5000 is known for its low rolling resistance, great grip in wet conditions and excellent puncture protection. The new all season tubeless ready GP 5000 gets stronger side walls care of another ply and higher TPI, taking already impressive puncture protection to the next level.

  • BlackChili rubber compound provides excellent grip, speed and durability
  • Lazer Grip textured profile increases grip when cornering
  • Active Comfort technology helps disperse vibrations common with lower TPI tires, offering a smoother ride
  • Tubeless ready gives you options
name: Continental Grand Prix 5000 AS TR 700C Folding Tire
